title: The stories.

img.alt: Illustration of someone holding a plant

content: Memorable stories from HackBeanpot are just one of the things that make us unique. Our attendees range from graduate CS students to designers who have never written a line of code in their life!

title: The projects.

img.alt: Illustration of someone holding a watering can

content: The projects made at HackBeanpot are interesting, meaningful, and a lot of the times, silly! Past projects have ranged from a crowdsourced music playlist to a scripting language made entirely of emojis.

title: The people.

img.alt: Illustration of someone holding a laptop

content: Every year HackBeanpot looks forward to hosting 150+ curious students, experienced mentors, and innovative sponsors in Boston. We are super proud of the community we've built - the only person weâ€™re missing is you!
